body: ### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe. Hard to notice that a fn has overloads, for example: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/251288/176055679-46021141-9da7-4b14-bed4-dfdbf2bf7397.png) ### Describe the solution you'd like Some visual change, and maybe a list of options (preferably linked) under the header: Like ``` # condition - condition(fn, timeout) - condition(fn) ## condition(fn, timeout) ... ## condition(fn) ... ```
title: [Docs] Make method overloads more obvious in docs
